_comment: Didn't use the element Carborane to translate this creature, instead combine the word coal and rock to create the word.
advancement.earth.breed_carboranea.title: 气氛渐熔
advancement.earth.deflect_pounce.title: 太粘人了
advancement.earth.deflect_pounce.desc: 用盾牌偏转一次红石岩猫的扑击
advancement.earth.deflect_powerful_pounc: 用盾牌偏转一次充能了的深层红石岩猫的扑击，然后缅怀你的盾牌
advancement.earth.enter_grease_splat.des: 将你的脚浸入发光油脂中
advancement.earth.feed_rubro.title: 来点吧，伙计
advancement.earth.feed_rubro.desc: 喂给一只红石岩猫红石
advancement.earth.find_carboranea.title: 哇，真小
advancement.earth.find_carboranea.desc: 找到一个在其煤炭窝里的煤岩蛛
advancement.earth.find_fossil.title: 多么奇异的化石
advancement.earth.find_fossil.desc: 找到一个红石化石，并保证其安全...
advancement.earth.find_gilded_fossil.des: 获取一个镀金红石化石，然后...？
advancement.earth.hurt_rubro.title: 冷静，冷静!
advancement.earth.hurt_rubro.desc: 攻击一个红石岩猫，然后保持冷静
advancement.earth.kill_with_pickaxe.titl: 这真的管用吗？Does This Really Work?
advancement.earth.kill_with_pickaxe.desc: 使用镐子击杀一个地下生物，正应该如此！
advancement.earth.obtain_redstone.title: 管好你自己Look Out for Yourself
advancement.earth.obtain_redstone.desc: 仔细听地面的声音，你可能打扰了什么人
advancement.earth.obtain_sickness_linger: 获取一个滞留型反胃药水
advancement.earth.reach_deepslate.title: 如此深入
advancement.earth.reach_deepslate.desc: 到达你世界的深层部分
advancement.earth.root.title: 地球冒险
advancement.earth.scoop_carboranea.title: 桶装煤岩蛛
advancement.earth.scoop_carboranea.desc: 使用水桶舀起一只煤岩蛛
